map.name: default
map.item:
In this task, a letter will be presented in the center of the screen.
For each block of trials, you will be given a target letter. Your task is to respond whether or not the letter presented matches your target letter.
If the letter matches your target letter, touch [TARGET_BUTTON] with your dominant hand.
If the letter does not match your target letter, touch [NONTARGET_BUTTON] with your dominant hand.
Please respond as quickly and accurately as possible.
Touch the screen to continue.
For this block of trials, your target is:

As a reminder, touch [TARGET_BUTTON] if you see the target letter. Press [NONTARGET_BUTTON] if you see any other letter.
Touch the screen to begin.

Take a rest!

map.name: Sounds
map.item:
In this task, you will hear a series of sounds.
For each block of trials, you will be given a target sound. Your task is to respond whether or not the sound presented matches your target sound.
If the sound matches your target sound, touch [TARGET_BUTTON] with your dominant hand.
If the sound does not match your target sound, touch [NONTARGET_BUTTON] with your dominant hand.
Please respond as quickly and accurately as possible.
Touch the screen to continue.
To hear the target sound for this block of trials, touch [TARGET_BUTTON].

As a reminder, touch [TARGET_BUTTON] if you hear the target sound. Press [NONTARGET_BUTTON] if you hear any other sound.
Press [NONTARGET_BUTTON] to begin when you are ready.

map.item:

For each block of trials, you will be given a target image. Your task is to respond whether or not the image presented matches your target image.
If the image matches your target image, touch [TARGET_BUTTON] with your dominant hand.
If the image does not match your target image, touch [NONTARGET_BUTTON] with your dominant hand.
Please respond as quickly and accurately as possible.
Touch the screen to continue.

As a reminder, touch [TARGET_BUTTON] if you see the target image. Press [NONTARGET_BUTTON] if you see any other image.
